page.title: 02LOWER KEY GREEN FARM
page.content: Mr. Heath is a dairy farmer, he breeds friesion cows.He owns 120 acres or 48 hectares of land.He has a herring bone parlour which milks 16 cows at a time,the jars the milk goes into will hold 32 litres,and when the cow has finished milking the milk goes into a bulk milk tank.The cows are milked morning and night they are milked at 6:30 in the morning which takes 2 hours and at 4:30 at night which takes 1.5 hours.The milk is collected once a day and taken to Manchester.In the winter the cows are kept in a shed where they lie in cubicles and they can help themselves to silage which Mr.Heath grows.He puts nitrogen on the grass to make it grow.
